sentences.english: The fluctuation curves of the total soluble sugar and the total acid in peel were W-shaped.
sentences.chinese: 果皮可溶性糖和总酸含量动态变化曲线均为“W”形。

sentences.english: Microwave-assisted extraction(MAE)method was studied for the extraction of a natural red pigment from the pericarp of Pitaya (Hylocereus undatus Britt &Rose).
sentences.chinese: 就微波提取火龙果果皮天然红色素的工艺进行探讨。

sentences.english: Chop mixed peels finely. Mix well with minced beef mixture.
sentences.chinese: 切幼干果皮，拌入牛肉混合物内。

sentences.english: Optimum Extraction Process of Total Flavonoids in Juglans mandshurica Leaves;
sentences.chinese: 采用常规提取法浸提核桃楸外果皮的化感作用成分。

sentences.english: See the garbage picked up thrown over the garbage bins to help students solve problems.
sentences.chinese: 看到垃圾拾起来扔过果皮箱，帮助同学解决难题。

sentences.english: The flavonoids content in pulp was very low, and relatively stable.
sentences.chinese: 果皮中类黄酮主要是橙皮苷，且呈现下降趋势。

sentences.english: At the fast growing phase of peel and seed, the changes in contents of polyamines were the same as those in aril.
sentences.chinese: 在果皮和种子的快速生长阶段多胺含量亦快速上升。

sentences.english: Selina cut herself while peeling an apple.
sentences.chinese: 当珊珊在削萍果皮时，她割伤了自己。

sentences.english: The content of crude fat is always very low inthe pericarp.
sentences.chinese: 果皮中粗脂肪的含量一直很低。

sentences.english: It's part of a normal diet as a component of apple peels.
sentences.chinese: 我们所吃的苹果皮中就有这种成分。

sentences.english: She could peel an apple in one long girlie strip.
sentences.chinese: 她能把苹果皮削成长长秀气的一条。

sentences.english: A berry with a hard rind, such as a cucumber, is called a pepo.
sentences.chinese: 具有坚硬外果皮的浆果，如黄瓜，叫做瓠果。

sentences.english: Pericarp browning is the most important factor affecting the shelf-life of longan fruit.
sentences.chinese: 果皮褐变是影响龙眼采后贮藏寿命的最主要因素。

sentences.english: I don’t have the energy to prepare salads and peel all that fruit.
sentences.chinese: 我没精力去准备沙拉和削水果皮。

sentences.english: The relationship between pericarp structure and storage and preservation in litchis was also discussed in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了荔枝果皮结构与贮藏保鲜的关系。

sentences.english: Other edible nuts, whether or not shelled or peeled, fresh or dried.
sentences.chinese: 其它食用坚果，无论是否去壳或去果皮，鲜或干。

definition: fruit (produced by a plant)/(fig.) fruits (of success etc)/results/gains
ear (of corn or sorghum etc)/bunch (of grapes)/infructescence
